content: शुक्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [शच्-क्तिन्] {@--1@} An oyster. shell, pearl-oyster; पात्रविशेषन्यस्तं गुणांतरं व्रजति शिल्पमाधातुः . जलमिव समुद्रशुक्तौ मुक्ताफलतां पयोदस्य <ls>M. 1. 6</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 67</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 17.</ls> {@--2@} A conchshell. {@--3@} A small shell, muscle. {@--4@} A portion of the skull. {@--5@} A curl of hair on a horse's breast (or neck); <ls>Śi. 5. 4</ls>; see <ls>Malli.</ls> thereon. {@--6@} A kind of perfume. {@--7@} A particular weight equal to two {%Karṣas%}. {@--8@} Hemorrhoids.
